text: Dūst dorand hamcunon, ki xud ʙa rohi kufr meravand, şumo niz kofir şaved, to ʙaroʙar garded. Pas ʙo heç jak az onon dūstī makuned, to on goh ki dar rohi Xudo muhoçirat kunand. Va agar rūj gardonand, dar har ço ki onhoro ʙijoʙed, ʙigiredu ʙikuşed va heç jak az onhoro ʙa dūstivu jorī intixoʙ nakuned
